problem_text: Let G be a finite simple transitive permutation group, and let δ(G) be the proportion of derangements in G. Is it true that δ(G) ⩾ 89/325? Note that δ(G) = 89/325 for the action of the Tits group G = 2F4(2)′ on the cosets of a maximal parabolic subgroup of the form 2^2.[2^8].S3 (Forum Math. Sigma, 13 (2025), paper no. e98, 62 pp.). T. C. Burness, M. Fusari
